plurals.name: found_instances
plurals.item: We found %1$d Home Assistant on your network.
We found %1$d Home Assistants on your network.

resources.string: The most advanced Home Automation app on Android
To continue with automatic setup, please connect to your home Wi-Fi network
Scanning your network for Home Assistant
Please enter your Home Assistant URL to continue. It must be a fully formed URL of the format "http://hassio.local:8123" (that is, containing a scheme/protocol, hostname and port).
We are now ready to connect to your Home Assistant and do the initial authentication. Tapping the Connect button will cause a browser to open for you to log in to.
